attributes.action: Breast Suspicions Should be Investigated Using 3 Diagnostic Tools
attributes.additional_details:
Every month delayed in cancer treatment can raise risk of death by around 10%
Minimising delays to treatment could improve cancer survival rates, say researchers  
https://www.bmj.com/company/newsroom/every-month-delayed-in-cancer-treatment-can-raise-risk-of-death-by-around-10/
attributes.background: Those with dense breast tissue are being missed, misdiagnosed face delays in findings thus treatment. A 3 point system should be used at each investigation and GPs, Consultants and Radiographers should listen to patients  told "It is normal"

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about patient care and diagnosis of health problems are a matter for the NHS and individual clinicians, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
